chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Queen Ethenielle Kirukan Materasu,
      p. 67 (65)—Holder of the Throne of the Clouds of Kandor—that is, the
      Queen of Kandor.  She is plump, and has gray-streaked black hair.  She
      is about half a hand taller than Merilille.
      She has blue eyes.  She was advised by Nianh, an
      Aes Sedai, but she fled Kandor as soon as news came that the
      Amyrlin had been deposed.
